title: LGBTQ Night at Reunion Surf Bar
desc: Come join us at Reunion Surf Bar for LGBTQ Sundays. To be held the second Sunday of every month. Doors open at 5:30 PM and DJ Duggz kicks off at 10 PM! Get ready for lovely ladies, dancing, tiki drinks, and ALL NIGHT HAPPY HOUR! Show our beautiful door gal this flyer and get a free shot of one of our famous house infused rums!? Must be 21 or older and must show valid ID. Tickets not necessary. No cover!? Located at at the corner of W 44th Street and 9th Ave. Look for the surf board!? Accessible by the A, C, E, N, Q, R, S, 1, 2, 3, and 7 trains off the Times Square station.? Lesbehonest.... You know you wanna come!
